Topic Definition: Percent of adults who reported that a doctor, nurse or other health professional has diagnosed them with diabetes (excludes pre-diabetes or diabetes only during pregnancy).
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Topic Definition: Age-adjusted rate of people who died due to diabetes.
Data Source: Illinois Department of Public Health, Death Certificate Data Files

Topic Definition: Age-adjusted rate of people for whom diabetes is a primary or secondary cause.
Data Source: Illinois Department of Public Health, Death Certificate Data Files

Topic Definition: Age-adjusted rate of  people who died due to cancer.
Data Source: Illinois Department of Public Health, Death Certificate Data Files

Topic Definition: Age-adjusted rate of people who died due to Alzheimer's disease.
Data Source: Illinois Department of Public Health, Death Certificate Data Files

Topic Definition: Percent of adults who reported that a doctor, nurse or other health professional has diagnosed them with high blood pressure (excludes borderline high, pre-hypertensive or hypertension diagnosed only during pregnancy).
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Topic Definition: Percent of adults who reported a height and weight that yield a body mass index of 30 or greater.
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Description: Coronary heart disease mortality rate (per 100,000 population), 2015-2019
Topic Definition: Age-adjusted rate of people who died due to coronary heart disease.
Data Source: Illinois Department of Public Health, Death Certificate Data Files

Description: Adult physical inactivity rate (% of adults), 2016-2018
Topic Definition: Percent of adults who reported that they did not participate in any physical activities or exercises in the past month.
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Description: Adult soda consumption rate (% of adults), 2016-2018
Topic Definition: Percent of adults who drank soda or pop or other sweetened drinks like sweetened iced tea, sports drinks, fruit punch or other fruit-flavored drinks at least once per day in the past month.
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Topic Definition: Percent of adults who visited a doctor or health care provider for a routine checkup in the past year.
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Topic Definition: Percent of adults who report that they've smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their life and report that they now smoke cigarettes every day or some days.
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Description: Adult binge drinking rate (% of adults), 2016-2018
Topic Definition: Percent of adults who report binge drinking (men having 5 or more drinks on one occasion, women having 4 or more drinks on one occasion) in the past month.
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Description: Adult fruit and vegetable servings rate (% of adults), 2016-2018
Topic Definition: Percent of adults who reported eating five or more servings of fruits and vegetables (combined) daily.
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Rename Title: Easy Access to Fruits and Veggies
Description: Easy access to fruits and vegetables rate (% of adults), 2016-2018
Topic Definition: Percent of adults who reported that it is very easy for them to get fresh fruits and vegetables.
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Topic Definition: Percent of residents who have low access to food, defined solely by distance: further than 1/2 mile from the nearest supermarket in an urban area, or further than 10 miles in a rural area.
Data Source: USDA, Economic Research Service, Food Access Research Atlas (Food Access Research Atlas)

Topic Definition: Annual average concentration in micrograms per cubic meter. PM 2.5, or particulate matter smaller than 2.5 microns in diameter, is one of the most dangerous pollutants because the particles can penetrate deep into the alveoli of the lungs.
Data Source: Environmental Protection Agency, EJSCREEN (EJSCREEN)

Topic Definition: Percent of residents without health insurance (at the time of the survey).
Data Source: American Community Survey (Tables B27001/C27001)

Topic Definition: The Hardship Index is a composite score reflecting hardship in the community (higher values indicate greater hardship). It incorporates unemployment, age dependency, education, per capita income, crowded housing, and poverty into a single score that allows comparison between geographies. It is highly correlated with other measures of economic hardship, such as labor force statistics, and with poor health outcomes. See technical notes for details.
Data Source: American Community Survey (Calculated by Metopio)

Topic Definition: The average number of years a person may expect to live.
Data Source: Illinois Department of Public Health, Death Certificate Data Files

Description: Received needed care rate (% of adults), 2016-2018
Topic Definition: Percent of adults who report that it is 'usually' or 'always' easy to get the care, tests or treatment they needed through their health plan.
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Topic Definition: Percent of births with a birthweight less than 2500 grams (5.5 pounds).
Data Source: Illinois Department of Public Health, Birth Certificate Data Files

Description: Overall health status - excellent, very good, good rate (% of adults), 2016-2018
Topic Definition: Percent of adults who reported that their overall health is good, very good or excellent.
Data Source: Chicago Department of Public Health, Healthy Chicago Survey

Topic Definition: Income in the past 12 months.
Data Source: American Community Survey (Table B19013)

Topic Definition: Percent of residents in families that are in poverty (below the Federal Poverty Level).
Data Source: American Community Survey (Table B17001)

Topic Definition: Percent of households receiving Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) benefits, formerly known as food stamps, over the past 12 months.
Data Source: American Community Survey (Tables B22003, B22005, and S2201)

Description: Public assistance income (cash welfare) (% of households), 2015-2019
Topic Definition: Percent of households reporting public assistance income over the past 12 months. This includes general assistance and Temporary Aid to Needy Families (TANF), or cash public assistance. This excludes Supplemental Security Income (SSI) and noncash benefits such as food stamps.
Data Source: American Community Survey (Table B19057)

Description: High school graduation rate (% of residents), 2015-2019
Topic Definition: Residents 25 or older with at least a high school degree: including GED and any higher education
Data Source: American Community Survey (Table B15002)

Topic Definition: Residents 25 or older with a four-year college (bachelor's) degree or higher
Data Source: American Community Survey (Table B15002)

Topic Definition: Percent of residents within each demographic group. Use this topic to explore age, gender, and racial/ethnic breakdowns.
Data Source: American Community Survey (Table B01001)

Topic Definition: Percent of residents within each demographic group. Use this topic to explore age, gender, and racial/ethnic breakdowns.
Data Source: American Community Survey (Table B01001)

Description: Demographics, Asian or Pacific Islander (% of residents), 2015-2019
Topic Definition: Percent of residents within each demographic group. Use this topic to explore age, gender, and racial/ethnic breakdowns.
Data Source: American Community Survey (Table B01001)

Description: Demographics, Hispanic or Latino (% of residents), 2015-2019
Topic Definition: Percent of residents within each demographic group. Use this topic to explore age, gender, and racial/ethnic breakdowns.
Data Source: American Community Survey (Table B01001)

Topic Definition: Average population over the time period.
Data Source: American Community Survey (ACS: Table B01001; Decennial Census: Table P012)
